mapper.select: select a.fid,a.fnumber,b.fid,b.fname_l2 from t_pm_user a,t_pm_usergroup b where a.fgroupid=b.fid order by a.fnumber desc

SELECT u.fid u.fnumber o.fname_l2 company, adm.fname_l2 department, FROM T_ORG_PositionMember pwe --任职情况 left JOIN t_org_position pot ON pwe.fpositionid=pot.fid left join T_ORG_Job jb on jb.fid=pot.fjobid left join t_bd_person p on p.fid = pwe.fpersonid left join t_pm_user u on u.fpersonid = p.fid left JOIN t_org_admin adm ON pot.fadminorgunitid=adm.fid left join t_org_storage o on o.fid = p.fhrorgunitid WHERE pwe.fbegindate < sysdate And pwe.FIsPrimary=1 and u.fnumber is not NULL
